EnvironmentVariableConfigFetcher (autotransform.config.envvar)

A config fetcher that utilizes environment variables for storing config settings.

class autotransform.config.envvar.EnvironmentVariableConfigFetcher

Bases: autotransform.config.fetcher.ConfigFetcher

A ConfigFetcher that utilizes environment variables as configuration storage. Environment variable names are of the form AUTO_TRANSFORM_<SECTION>_<SETTING>, using the sections and settings from data/sample_config.ini

get_credentials_github_base_url() → Optional[str]

Fetch the github base URL from AUTO_TRANSFORM_CREDENTIALS_GITHUB_BASE_URL.

Returns

The github base URL.

Return type

Optional[str]

get_credentials_github_password() → Optional[str]

Fetch the github password from AUTO_TRANSFORM_CREDENTIALS_GITHUB_PASSWORD.

Returns

The github password.

Return type

Optional[str]

get_credentials_github_token() → Optional[str]

Fetch the github token from AUTO_TRANSFORM_CREDENTIALS_GITHUB_TOKEN.

Returns

The github token,

Return type

Optional[str]

get_credentials_github_username() → Optional[str]

Fetch the github username from AUTO_TRANSFORM_CREDENTIALS_GITHUB_USERNAME.

Returns

The github username.

Return type

Optional[str]

get_imports_components() → List[str]

The modules containing the custom components to use: see autotransform.thirdparty.components from AUTO_TRANSFORM_CREDENTIALS_IMPORTS_COMPONENTS.

Returns

A list of the modules containing custom components that are not part base

AutoTransform.

Return type

List[str]

get_runner_local() → Optional[str]

Gets the JSON encoded Runner component to use for local runs.

Returns

The JSON encoded Runner component to use for local runs.

Return type

str

Gets the JSON encoded Runner component to use for remote runs.

Returns
